attributes.action: Protect patriotic songs in last night at the proms from being axed.
attributes.additional_details: Reduce funding for the BBC if they do axe the songs that make many Britons proud of their country.
attributes.background: Last night at the proms, televised on the BBC, has many patriotic songs, such as rule Britannia played which have come under threat of being axed by recent events.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Privatise the BBC and make them self-funding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
